original_text: So I tell you this. When you pray to ask God for anything, believe in him. Believe that you have received that thing. Then you will have whatever you have asked for.
korean_text: 그러므로 내가 너희에게 말하노니 무엇이든지 기도하고 구하는 것은 받은 줄로 믿으라 그리하면 너희에게 그대로 되리라

sentences.original_text: When you pray to ask God for anything,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 무엇이든지 하나님께 구하기 위해 기도할 때,

sentences.original_text: Believe that you have received that thing.
Then you will have whatever you have asked for.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 너희가 구한 것은 무엇이든지 얻게 될 것이다.
